features: Lamp Size: Lamp Size: The Shade is double-layered with 4.72 inches diameter and 9.06 inches height. And the whole table lamp is 10.83 inches high with 3.94 inches diameter antislip pedestal for a perfect looking.
Lamp Parameter: Black Base, 110V-130V, 60Wattage Bulb Max; Lamp bulb base: E26(Bulb Not Included), you can choose a warm white or cool white bulb yourself depending on the brightness you want.
Easy Usage: the distance between the ON/OFF switch and the lamp base is about 25cm which makes it’s convenient to use.(The effect of the main picture is with a warm white bulb on)
Simple and Vintage: Smooth wooden texture base with a cylinder linen fabric shade definitely gives much aesthetics to this desk lamp and makes it a perfect addition to your room.
body.description: Lifeholder Latest Design Wooden Fabric Table lamp Is Just for Your Choice Lifeholder Energy-Saving table Lamps comes with environmental vision, low power consumption light source, fit for bedroom, living room, dining room, office or study. Simple but Vintage design, looks modern but also retro with Smooth wooden texture base with a cylinder linen fabric shade, never out of fashionEnergy-efficient light with compact fabric shade which could definitely creat a warm and cozy feelings is perfect for illuminating / sleeping. Important Note for assemblying Make sure cut off power supply before finish the assembly. Firstly, please unscrew the ring from the bulb base.Secondly, put the lampshade on it.Thirdly, screw on the ring back again to fit the threads to stabilize the shade.Finally, Install the E26 bulb (Not Included) Warm Tips:Our Plug is US standard and won't fit in outlet of UK or Euro standard.We do not recommend using this lamp as reading fixture. When you needed, we would suggest that you use a high watt bulb for more brightness and must be cool white for reading.If the lampshade was bent when you receive it, We’re sure that they’ve damaged in transit. Please let us know via email and we’ll send you new one for free.The size is measured by hand, so there may 1-3 cm error, please kindly note that. Thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THE SIZE. WELL MADE PRODUCT. LOOKS GREAT
reviews.reviewText: I have been decorating for Christmas already. I have a large Nativity set that is in my foyer on the top of a buffet. The area was dark. I had only a small amount of space on each side of the figures to put any lights.When I saw these, they looked perfect. AND THEY ARE! They add light. They look special but do not detract from the Nativity scene. Well worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice lighting for evening! Warm lamp shade cover
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice small lamp that does not take up too much real estate on your table, and it's perfect for occasional use! Very very nice very pleased with the design, the appearance, the warmth of the lamp shade color. Second one I bought in 2 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: This is a super cute little desk lamp. It gives off a warm, calming light. It is perfect for my desk as I am a teacher and sometimes I want the fluorescent lights off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really didn’t expect these to be what they were as I didn’t think they were that expansive for lamps, they look fantastic. The lighting with the lampshade makes the room feel warm and cozy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but…
reviews.reviewText: These are very nice, work great, and throw off a good amount of light. I got the one with the black shade, the picture showed the base was supposed to be black but the one I received was silver. I still like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little lamp works with LED bulbs
reviews.reviewText: I bought this and put a 60W-equivalent warm white 3000K LED bulb in it, it looks great. Don't use cold white 5000K bulbs unless you like the fluorescent office-lighting look (the phone picture I posted doesn't quite do justice to the color, it doesn't look that white in person). Easy to assemble and arrived like 1-2 days after I ordered it. Will take twist or incandescent bulbs also, 60W limit on the latter for safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect night light for living room and kitchen and so affordable
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, versatile, easy to assemble, affordable table lamp. I saw assembly directions before I purchased it (I always check out everything prior to purchases). I opened the box and immediately assembled it. Then I looked through my light bulb boxes.I used a 7 1/2 Watt appliance bulb, the kind that looks like a smooth, round golf ball. Perfect! I taped the cord to the tabletop so I could just reach over and turn it on and off. No fiddling around to find that switch.I ONLY did that because the lamp is situated in an area with alot of knickknacks, my large iPod speaker, vases, near my InstantPot, and other things. Taping it to the table top (actually small filing cabinet top), makes it so easy to access the switch!I have no idea how long it will last. But it is exactly perfect for my space, with a light-diffusing lamp shade, and ability to use any standard light bulb up to 40 Watts (?) I think.I work in my front bedroom turned office. I often walk across the living room, into the kitchen turning left or hallway to bathroom turning right. I need a nightlight to safely walk around.I don't want to bump into furniture and break something. I have a lot of fragile items everywhere. I don't want to pick up broken glass or ceramics (or lose items I enjoy looking at). Helps prevent giving myself serious black and blue bruises (which I've done far too often in my long life).Years ago, I bought some cute little vintage lamps that use chandelier bulbs. Came with pretty lace and beaded lampshades. But the flimsy lampshade was bright from various angles. Finally looked for other light bulbs and shades. Then realized I should get a new lamp.And this is PERFECT for my needs. Hope it lasts awhile!(I wish the light bulbs I bought locally years ago, sold on Amazon too, would be delivered to my home. I wonder if because I live in California, the exact same bulbs, same manufacturer, won't deliver here but I could buy locally the past. Who knows IF they carry it. And dealing with local hardware stores became a nightmare. Horrible, mean, apathetic clueless employees and minimal stock. So I turn to Amazon, and only Amazon, for many office, household and computer supplies!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for elderly parent
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my elderly father who lives with us. He survived two strokes and and has been diagnosed with onset dementia. He is able to get around with the aid of a walker. Unfortunately he forgets how to turn his bedroom light on and off. This little lamp works perfect for him in the middle of the night while the rest of us are asleep. I have it positioned on a night stand near his bed and angled towards his door. It picks up when he sits up in bed and also when he is returning to his room. Best of all it’s shuts off automatically. The lamp is smaller than I expected and the supplied bulb was not as bright as I thought it should be. But after two weeks using the supplied bulb it is perfect. It’s neither too bright when his dog triggers the sensor, nor is it too dim when he needing to use the bathroom at night. The bulb is brighter than your standard wall-plug-in night lights and the lamp size is small enough not to take up too much room on the nightstand. It does have the option to manually turn the light on and off and could work as a reading lamp. We haven’t used the ac and USB ports on the side but like the added option. Overall, for our application, the price, size and functionality of this lamp works exactly as we hoped for.
Excelente producto! Las Lamparas son preciosas y quedan de maravilla sobre la mesa de noche. Llegaron muy rápido y bien protegidas. Las recomiendo ampliamente
I was looking for a simple mid century styled table lamp. This provides uplight for the picture hanging above the table while providing a suitable ambient/indirect light source.

The design of this lamp is absolutely elegant, modern, and with a cozy vibe. The only disappointment I had was that it was not compatible with the Canadian plugs and I had to purchase a power adaptor to make it work. The plug it came with is designed for use in Asia only.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lamp shade is dented and the wire exposed
reviews.reviewText: I’m bummed about the shade - I have to keep it though because it’s for a specific spot in my classroom - and school starts now. My fault for the timing bc now I have to keep it.
